-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | sqlite backend for sql-simple
--   
--   sqlite backend for sql-simple
@package sql-simple-sqlite
@version 0.3.0

module Database.Sql.Simple.SQLite
data SQLite
SQLite :: Connection -> SQLite
sqlite :: Proxy '[SQLite]
instance Typeable SQLite
instance Eq (ConnectInfo SQLite)
instance Read (ConnectInfo SQLite)
instance Show (ConnectInfo SQLite)
instance (FromRow a, FromRow b) => FromRow (a :. b)
instance (ToRow a, ToRow b) => ToRow (a :. b)
instance FromField a => FromRow (Only a)
instance ToField a => ToRow (Only a)
instance IsString (ConnectInfo SQLite)
instance Transaction SQLite
instance Backend SQLite
